issues.message: Hardcoded secret detected in source code. This exposes sensitive credentials.

standards.name: ISO 27001
standards.description: Privileged access rights shall be allocated and used on a restricted basis

standards.name: OWASP Top 10 2021
standards.description: Failures related to cryptography which often leads to sensitive data exposure

standards.name: CWE
standards.description: The software contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key

issues.remediation: Remove hardcoded credentials and use environment variables or secure configuration management instead.

issues.message: Permissive CORS configuration allows requests from any origin, potentially enabling cross-origin attacks.

standards.name: ISO 27001
standards.description: Network controls shall be managed and controlled to protect information

standards.name: OWASP Top 10 2021
standards.description: Security misconfiguration is commonly a result of insecure default configurations

issues.remediation: Configure CORS to only allow specific trusted origins instead of using wildcard (*) or no restrictions.

issues.message: Error handler returns detailed stack traces to clients, potentially exposing sensitive system information.

standards.name: ISO 27001
standards.description: Event logs recording user activities shall be produced and kept

standards.name: OWASP Top 10 2021
standards.section: A09-2021 - Security Logging and Monitoring Failures
standards.description: Insufficient logging and monitoring, coupled with missing or ineffective integration

issues.remediation: Return generic error messages to clients and log detailed errors server-side only.
